# File test/view_test.rb, line 92
  def test_full_output
    paginate
    expected = "<div class=\"pagination\"><span class=\"disabled prev_page\">&laquo; Previous</span>\n<span class=\"current\">1</span>\n<a href=\"/foo/bar?page=2\" rel=\"next\">2</a>\n<a href=\"/foo/bar?page=3\">3</a>\n<a href=\"/foo/bar?page=2\" class=\"next_page\" rel=\"next\">Next &raquo;</a></div>\n"
    expected.strip!.gsub!(/\s{2,}/, ' ')
    
    assert_dom_equal expected, @html_result
  end
